input.sentences: i bought a new hat for the party .
i brought my entire family with me .
we met a lot of new people there .
everyone was very warm and friendly .
the had that i brought was amazing .
output.sentences: Everyone bought hats for the annual holiday party.
The event brought the entire family and all their friends out from home.
The people met one another with a lot of smiles!
The atmosphere was warm and friendly the entire party.
One woman even brought an amazing hat cake to celebrate.
